text: Malagilo gaandikigwa muipande imaganga ibangigwe. Iganukube kujomole kwakwe ngukuleta kiu, nambu kibumo chakwe kikiba kikolongwa muno ata Akaisilaeli ngabachipu kukulolakea kumio ja Musa gambu ga kukung'ala kwakwe. Kung'ala kwenio kukiba kukingobu tu. Yene anda ibi Lilagilo elijambukia kiu litendigwa kukibumo kikolongwa yenela,
